name: The Moon Runs Away
description:
«I have never seen or heard of such a fish. But I must kill him. I am glad we do not have to try to kill the stars.»

Fishing in the moonlight. Shapes in the water. Serene sea.

«Imagine if each day a man must try to kill the moon, he thought. The moon runs away.»

An interactive experience for VR based on Ernest Hemingway's The Old Man And The Sea. Created by Miki Anthony, Michail Nenkov and Martin Pichlmair during VR Game Jam 2015.
